name: Combative Crops
description:
A typical farming sim, except you can’t just harvest your crops, you have to fight the slimes that you grow!

HOW TO PLAY:

Fight against the Slimes in your field to gather Slime Bits. Plant those Bits to give birth to more Slimes for tomorrow or sell them to buy upgrades.

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys. Aim with Mouse and Attack with Left-Click (can only attack inside the field’s gates). Plant the Green Slime Bits on the field with P. Plant the Blue Slime Bits on the field with O. Use the Mouse to navigate through menus and shops.

Enjoy!
